extensionAttribute.description: This will display a computer's Watchman Monitoring URL, where its full status can be reviewed.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh if [ -f /Library/MonitoringClient/Utilities/ExportStatus ]; then echo "`defaults read /Library/MonitoringClient/ClientData/UnifiedStatus.plist ClientURL`" else echo "Watchman Monitoring not installed" fi
